author: barnabasbusa
content:
We plan to shut down devnet 9 today at noon UTC.

Please yell if you would like to have devnet 9 up longer than that. 

Devnet 10 will stick around till Monday at noon UTC.

author: tersec
content: will there be any running devnets after that, or is the plan to start focusing on more longer-lived/public testnets?

author: parithosh
content:
TLDR from ACD:
- Devnet-9 turns off today
- Devnet-10 turns off monday
- Devnet-11: small scale, with mev and long term comes online early next week
- Goerli shadow fork: comes online early next week, lives for under a week mostly

author: parithosh
content: Teku, lodestar, prysm and lighthouse have all had mev blocks produced on devnet-10 with blob sidecars included. adding more nodes and validating the rate.

author: parithosh
content:
<@654267572107083777> I'm seeing this error on the nimbus nodes regarding mev:
```
INF 2023-10-27 13:07:24.222+00:00 Payload builder error                      topics="beacval" slot=30037 head=7a23ad03:30036 validator=ab8da50b err="getBlindedExecutionPayload REST decoding error: Unable to decode REST response, error [Serialization error]"
```

`ssh devops@157.230.62.250` to check

author: tersec
content: the version tested there is probably missing one or both of https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/5522 and https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/5526 which fix some necessary REST serialization for the `BlindedBlobsBundle` which is patr of the `BuilderBid` which is part of the `SignedBuilderBid`

author: parithosh
content: ah got it, should i update nimbus nodes to the latest `unstable` then?

author: barnabasbusa
content: qq: are all clients ipv6 ready?
